title: Dragon's Hoard Cavern Adventure #36
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Entrance Cavern
rooms.description: A vast cavern entrance carved into the mountainside. Ancient dragon claw marks score the stone walls. Piles of old bones and rusted weapons litter the floor. The air is thick with the smell of sulfur and old smoke. Torches flicker in iron sconces, casting dancing shadows across glittering veins of gold in the rock.

items.name: pile of old bones
items.description: A heap of bones from previous adventurers and unfortunate travelers

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A small brass key covered in soot and grime

items.name: carved stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with dragon symbols carved into its surface
items.text: Ancient inscription: The Great Wyrm Scorathax was born in the year 842 of the Dragon Age. His hoard contains three sacred treasures: the Ruby of Flames, the Sapphire of Storms, and the Emerald of Earth.

items.name: broken weapon rack
items.description: A splintered wooden rack that once held weapons. Two compartments remain intact.

items.name: ancient dragon scroll
items.description: A scroll written in both dragon script and common tongue
items.text: Dragon Lore: Scorathax the Red guards his treasure jealously. The year of his birth unlocks many secrets. His favorite gem is the Ruby of Flames, which he keeps in the locked coffer near his resting place.

items.name: heavy iron key
items.description: A large iron key with a dragon head design on the handle

items.name: ironbound treasure chest
items.description: A sturdy chest reinforced with iron bands and a brass lock

items.name: explorer's journal
items.description: A leather journal belonging to a previous adventurer
items.text: Final Entry: I've made it to the dragon's lair! The passage to the treasure gallery requires answering three questions. I've learned that Scorathax is the dragon's name, his hoard is hidden in the mountain depths, and the Ruby of Flames is his most prized possession. If only I had been braver...

items.name: passage to treasure gallery
items.description: A narrow passage leading deeper into the mountain. Stone doors block the way, covered in dragon runes that form three questions.

password_questions.question: What is the name of the dragon who dwells here?
password_questions.hint: Check the stone pedestal inscription and the explorer's journal

password_questions.question: Where does the dragon keep his hoard?
password_questions.hint: The explorer's journal mentions this location

password_questions.question: What is the dragon's most prized treasure?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention the dragon's favorite gem

rooms.name: Treasure Gallery
rooms.description: A magnificent chamber filled with mountains of gold coins, jeweled crowns, and ancient artifacts. Crystal formations in the ceiling cast rainbow light across the treasure. Three ornate display cases stand against the far wall, each containing a legendary gem. The heat intensifies here, and you can hear the deep breathing of something massive beyond the eastern door.

items.name: mountain of gold coins
items.description: An enormous pile of gold coins from a hundred different kingdoms

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A beautifully crafted silver key with sapphire inlays

items.name: ruby display case
items.description: A glass case containing a magnificent red gem that seems to flicker with inner fire

items.name: Ruby of Flames
items.description: A legendary ruby that radiates warmth and glows like an ember

items.name: sapphire display case
items.description: A glass case holding a deep blue gem that crackles with electricity

items.name: Sapphire of Storms
items.description: A legendary sapphire that sparks with lightning when touched

items.name: emerald display case
items.description: A glass case showcasing a vibrant green gem that pulses with life energy

items.name: Emerald of Earth
items.description: A legendary emerald that hums with the power of nature

items.name: dragon's treasure map
items.description: A detailed map of the cavern system drawn by the dragon himself
items.text: Map notation: The sanctum door opens only for those who prove their worth. Bring the three sacred gems: Ruby, Sapphire, and Emerald. Place them in the altar to gain entry to my inner sanctum.

items.name: stone tablet
items.description: A tablet with warnings carved in multiple languages
items.text: WARNING: The dragon Scorathax sleeps in his sanctum beyond. Only those bearing the three sacred treasures may enter safely. The Ruby of Flames, Sapphire of Storms, and Emerald of Earth must be presented together.

items.name: dragon sanctum door
items.description: Massive bronze doors decorated with dragon imagery. Three gem-shaped indentations are set into the door's surface. The door requires all three legendary gems to open.

rooms.name: Dragon's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the dragon's lair! The chamber is vast and circular, with a ceiling that disappears into darkness. In the center, upon a massive bed of gold and jewels, rests Scorathax the Red Dragon. His scales gleam like molten metal, and smoke curls from his nostrils as he sleeps. The three sacred gems you carry begin to glow, and the dragon's eyes slowly open. He regards you with ancient wisdom rather than rage.

items.name: Scorathax the Red Dragon
items.description: A magnificent red dragon of immense size and age, surprisingly calm in your presence
items.text: The dragon speaks in a voice like rolling thunder: 'You have proven yourself worthy by gathering my three sacred treasures. Few have the courage and wisdom to reach this place. You may take what you can carry from my hoard, and I grant you safe passage. Go now, and tell the world that Scorathax the Red still guards his mountain.'

items.name: dragon's greatest treasure
items.description: A chest overflowing with the finest gems, gold, and magical artifacts from the dragon's personal collection

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the Dragon's Hoard Cavern and earned the respect of Scorathax the Red! The ancient dragon allows you to take a portion of his treasure and grants you safe passage from his lair. You emerge from the mountain wealthy beyond measure, with an incredible tale of the dragon who valued courage and wisdom over violence. You win!
